text:
Message 1804 of 4024
Thank you.
That was a ton of fun. We really did a lot of cool stuff together. I know we both wanted it to last longer, but that will come in time. And it’s not a
gripe at you at all. He is super excited to have his birthday there. Of course you are welcome to sleep over as well.
Hope you have a wonderful night.
Thanks again
-robert
Sent:03/02/2024 at 05:58 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/02/2024 at 06:00 PM)
Subject:Good Times
Message 1805 of 4024
... are really hard not being able to talk to you. Tonight is one of those. I know it’s in the past and I have to get used to it, but I’d give anything to be
able to just talk right now...sorry...
Sent:03/02/2024 at 09:26 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/03/2024 at 06:02 AM)
Subject:Some Nights...
Message 1806 of 4024
I apologize. That was inappropriate. Please forgive me
Sent:03/02/2024 at 09:30 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/03/2024 at 06:02 AM)
Subject:Re: Some Nights...
Message 1807 of 4024
If I can make a suggestion...
I’d like to blow glass with you. I have looked into for Max and I but can’t till we get the Ok. It’s about an hour. Near your work. And they have all the
supplies.
You just learn how to do it (it’s like the show we used to watch at Alki) and make some goofy craft (not like the show we watched at Alki... )
If you would allow, we could just meet there and take the class. We hardly even need to talk. And it might be fun given how competitive we are with
each other.
I’ll do all the legwork and even pick up the tab.
Sent:03/02/2024 at 10:37 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/03/2024 at 06:02 AM)
Subject:Re: Improving our Relationship for Everyone
